CMD_GLANCENAMES_DESCRIPTION: List of all available glancable names.
CMD_GLANCE_DESCRIPTION:
Glance specific module(s) for a while. See `/glancenames` also.
e.g)`/glance clock`.
CMD_GLANCEOFF_DESCRIPTION: Turn off glancing mode and back to previous.
CMD_ASSTNT_GLANCE_DESCRIPTION: Glance specific modules for a while.
CMD_GLANCE_IMPOSSIBLE: I cannot find module {name} for glancing now.
CMD_GLANCE_NO_ARGS: Alias or name of module is required.
